nodes.text: Tot was a male Sullustan who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Tot worked for Alina Impeveri on Cularin. When Impeveri was tried to find the crashed podracer Skall Delos, she wanted to put anyone else who was searching for him off the trail, so she placed Force illusions on Tot, the Zabrak Aeios and the Human Naren to make them all resemble Delos. The illusion masking Tot was the weakest of the three.
